data.introduce: 本接口实现了电子客票自动出票的功能。对应黑屏ETDZ、ATDZ、DTDZ等指令。
data.business: 该接口支持国内、国际电子客票出票。
data.functions:
1. 支持国内、国际出票。
2. 支持多旅客类型出票。 
3. 支持 PNR 中的全部旅客或者部分旅客出票。比如PNR中有3个旅客，可以指定3人全部出票，或者第1名旅客出票，或者第1，2名旅客出票，或者第2. 3名旅客出票出票。 
4. 支持航段状态是否RR。
5. 支持本票、BSP、BOP票证。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirTicketIssueRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"自动出票请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirTicketIssueInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"PrintNumber","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"TicketingCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"指定航司","children":[]},{"name":"PsgrID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客序号","children":[]},{"name":"PassType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客类型。
仅支持ADL和INF。
单独出婴儿票，传INF；
单独出婴儿之外的票，
传ADL。","children":[]},{"name":"IsRR","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"是否RR。
默认false","children":[]},{"name":"SubscribeTicketInd","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否客票订阅","children":[]},{"name":"SubscribeFltInd","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否订阅航班动态数据","children":[]},{"name":"SpecialIssueCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"特殊出票标识","children":[]},{"name":"UniteIssueType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"ET/EMD联合出票标识。
*S:BSP出票
*O:BOP出票","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证类型。
如：BSP,BOP,AL","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketIssueRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"自动出票返回","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"openet","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"OPENET","children":[]},{"name":"pnrno","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"pnr号","children":[]},{"name":"currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币","children":[]},{"name":"amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"金额","children":[]},{"name":"startTktno","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"开始票号","children":[]},{"name":"endTktno","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结束票号","children":[]},{"name":"originalMsg","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原文信息","children":[]},{"name":"multiResp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"响应","children":[]},{"name":"leagalResp","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结束票号","children":[]},{"name":"rrResult","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"RR结果","children":[]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirTicketIssueRQ TicketType="BOP">
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="PEK160"/>
    </POS>
    <AirTicketIssueInfo>
        <!-- PNR号 -->
        <PNR>HR6R6T</PNR>
        <!-- 打票机 -->
        <PrintNumber>1</PrintNumber>
        <!-- 指定航司 -->
        <TicketingCarrier>CX</TicketingCarrier>
        <!-- 是否RR -->
        <IsRR>false</IsRR>
    </AirTicketIssueInfo>
</TES_AirTicketIssueRQ>

<TES_AirTicketIssueRQ TicketType="AL">
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="PEK160"/>
    </POS>
    <AirTicketIssueInfo>
        <!-- PNR号 -->
        <PNR>HR6R6T</PNR>
        <!-- 打票机 -->
        <PrintNumber>1</PrintNumber>
        <!-- 指定航司 -->
        <TicketingCarrier>CX</TicketingCarrier>
        <!-- 是否RR -->
        <IsRR>false</IsRR>
    </AirTicketIssueInfo>
</TES_AirTicketIssueRQ>

<TES_AirTicketIssueRQ>
<POS>
<!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
</POS>
<AirTicketIssueInfo>
<!-- PNR号 -->
<PNR>HR6R6T</PNR>
<!-- 打票机 -->
<PrintNumber>60</PrintNumber>
<!-- 指定航司 -->
<TicketingCarrier>CA</TicketingCarrier>
<!-- 是否RR -->
<IsRR>false</IsRR>
</AirTicketIssueInfo>
</TES_AirTicketIssueRQ>
